attributes.action: 14/0246/OUT Residential development, Holcroft Way, Cross Houses, Shropshire
attributes.additional_details:
OBJECT
PROPOSED RESIDENTIAL DEVELOPMENT, SOUTH OF HOLCROFT WAY, CROSS HOUSES (39 Units) - Application Number 14/0246/OUT

This is NOT SUSTAINABLE, nor does it conform to NPPF. The development MUST NOT occur; green field, nature, surface run-off, affordability, traffic, parking, safety, facilities for children, employment, transport, infrastructure, local education and community views have all been OVERLOOKED with this proposal.
